dcterms:description: The English RST Discourse Treebank is used for experiments in RST parsing, providing a structured representation of discourse relations in text.
dcterms:title: English RST Discourse Treebank

dcterms:creator: Mitchell P. Marcus

dcterms:description: The Penn Treebank is referenced as the source of the English RST Discourse Treebank, providing a large annotated corpus of English.
dcterms:title: Penn Treebank
